description: Simple cloth masks are now mandatory on public transport and in shops within most states.
title: Coronavirus: Germans don compulsory masks as lockdown eases
title_page: Coronavirus: Germans don compulsory masks as lockdown eases - BBC News
maintext: But Christine, a special needs teacher, who wasn't wearing a mask and uses a scarf around her mouth and nose in shops, worried that mask-wearing is more about virtue-signalling than safety. "The situation is really confused," she said. "Some people wear masks, some people don't. It makes the whole thing absurd. I think it's a bit of a placebo."
